title: The Over The Rainbow Project
filterKeywords: over the rainbow south africa 27 years mike stopforth
description:
Are you over the Rainbow Nation promise?

Was there ever a Rainbow Nation to begin with?

It's been 27 years since South Africa became a democracy; the same number of years former president Nelson Mandela was kept behind bars.

It also just so happens to be our international dialing code. It feels like a significant number.

I don't know about you, but I don't want South Africa's next 27 years to look like the last 27 years.
